name: Mirage of Withering Florets
description:
A Danmakufu game created for the Bullet Hell Artistry 4 Contest: Unworldly Manifestations in Bullet Hell Engines~

Kazuta Namaso has decided to take a nap after a long day of work, but instead, he finds himself in a very odd dream. And it turns out, he isn't alone after all.

This game is set within Normal/Hard difficulty and may be challenging, but you will have a lot of lives though. 

Special thanks to PillowsofZino and Syoudre!
